message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good starting point.
You wanted a 60/40 split, so I'll offer you a 40/60 split. Fair is fair, right?
Let's try a 50/50 split this time.  Inflation is a factor, but I think fairness is more important.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give away the farm.
